body:
Comment 3: 
Yes, govet and the compiler both tell you when they can't
parse the input.  I don't think that's the same.  They'll both
tell you about not being able to open the file too.

That's not what it is.  Also the issue tracker is not great for
conversations.  If you want to talk about the philosophy of
govet it would be better to do it on the golang-nuts mailing list.

Russ
